entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @atrupar Trying not to be super critical of what the WH is/isn't doing about #COVID19, but when the Surgeon General says the president is healthier than he is I've got to wonder how many liters of Trump brand kool-aid he had to drink to say that.
